abstract.t: This document defines a messaging protocol for the Delay-Tolerant Networking (DTN) Management Architecture (DTNMA) Asynchronous Management Model (AMM) and a transport binding for exchanging those messages over a network. This Asynchronous Management Protocol (AMP) does not require transport-layer sessions, operates over unidirectional links, and seeks to reduce the energy and compute power necessary for performing remote management of resource constrained devices possibly over challenged networks.
